mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer( id, name, description, active, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{active}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, active = #{active}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
